column4: ------ Aug. 8 (Xinhua) –  Anti-human Trafficking and Minor Protection Office of the Phnom Penh Police Commissariat
column5: raided a site in Sen Sok district on November 8. ------15 people were arrested over charges of illegal surrogacy.------According to the sources
column6: 11 of 13 women detained are pregnant.------It has not been confirmed whether the surrogacy was for foreigners
column7: as has been the case in the past
column8: but police are questioning those involved to prepare a court case.------It should be noted that surrogacy has been made illegal  in Cambodia.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/385719
